vibesExplanation:
The video is most aligned with "The Zen Flow" vibe because it is a slow, grounding, and breath-centered meditation, as indicated by the title "Guided Morning Meditation" and the description emphasizing mindfulness and grounding. The tags, such as "mindful meditation" and "morning mantra," further reinforce this vibe. The high number of views and likes suggests that it resonates strongly with a broad audience seeking relaxation and focus, typical of The Zen Flow. The strong sense of peace and focus described in the metadata aligns with this vibe, warranting a score of 0.95.

The video also embodies elements of "The Deep Recharge," as it provides a mental reset and helps relieve stress, as described in user comments where viewers express profound emotional and psychological relief. The regular practice of the meditation is seen as rejuvenating and transformative, fitting the "Deep Recharge" vibe well, although less intensely than "Zen Flow," resulting in a score of 0.7. Other vibes were excluded due to the lack of indicators for physical exertion or dynamic movement common in those categories.
